title: Gangplank update previewed
body:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/champion-update/gangplank-sails-pbe

> As unpredictable as he is brutal, the self-appointed pirate king known as Gangplank rules Bilgewater through a mix of fear, violence and cunning. Where he sails, death and ruin follow, and such is his infamy and reputation that the merest sight of his black sails on the horizon causes panic among even the hardiest crew.

> Larger-than-life corsair kings tend to accumulate tall tales the way a warship picks up barnacles, but the tenuous balance of power in Bilgewater hinges on everyone believing the stories told about him.

I loved his old sailor skin, I felt like Shaggy from scooby doo with my bell bottom pants and dashing unkempt beard. I will probably never wear this skin now.

I'm really annoyed that this rework didn't actually fix any of the issues surrounding gangplank.  His Q is still wonky.  Critplank is still a thing.  His E is cool in theory, but critplank is still going to be the defining playstyle.
"Ranged melee" has always been the unique part of Gankplank's gameplay identity. How in blazes is it an issue, given that it's an identity nobody else shares?

In what way is his Q wonky?
and why is critplank so bad?

The main goal of this rework was probably to give him more visible power and to make his playstyle more interesting and unique.

Y'know. For a short non-bio, that little lore-replacement tidbit is rather well done and hints at a lot of semi-substantial things.

Almost-good job Riot!

---

As for the rework itself, I feel sad that Gangplank had to be turned into such a generic badass pirate king. I really liked that he wasn't the older, heavy, almost royal, Captain with a capital C. But the rough and ready and very energetic and still somewhat young man in his prime.

Old GP felt like he was such a prominent figure in Bilgewater, and a League Champion at that, because of his charisma, attitude, energy and raw skill.

My initial impression of this new version is an old cunning cougar who just so happens to be strong enough to throw any dissenters out the window.

In everything from how excessively broad his shoulders are, to how cartoony and clunky his gun is, to how he no longer has a basic and neat beard, but this massive thing covering his neck.

At least his VO seems like it feels the same, and his updated gameplay looks to be really cool.

Just a shame he wasn't made more unique.
His bio is one sentence longer than the usual. It's a progress!

Also Death's Daughter is just an upgrade name, not the name of his ship. Potentially it's the name of the extra cannon that comes with the upgrade.
